item.title: Answer on Docker
item.description: replace <password1> with your own password version: "3" services: answer: image: answerdev/answer ports: - '9080:80' restart: on-failure volumes: - answer-data:/data depends_on: - mariadb mariadb: restart: unless-stopped image: mariadb:10.
